title: Send tabs continues to be unreliable and will never regain my trust
content:
I sent tabs from my phone to Firefox on laptop. It was 4 or 5 tabs.

They came in, started to load, and I pinned them to my pinned tabs list. I only have about 15 pinned tabs.

I went to open a new tab to do something else while I let the newly arrived tabs sit there. I look back at my taskbar, they're gone.

I tried to record a video of what happened. Didn't work unfortunately.

Firefox can fix this unreliability by giving me a universal synced 'send tabs' history to view.

All in all, I remember an initial period where send tabs was unreliable. Then it became more reliable. Then this happened.

I cannot trust send tabs ever again, at least for a very long time. Please implement 'send tabs' history.
creator: ACookieMonster

title: Characters dissapearing, missing, garbled only in Firefox
content: Characters dissapearing, missing, garbled only in Firefox. Seems to be ok in troubleshooting mode. This only happens in Firefox so it appears to be isolated. As you hover over links is when it happens the most. I have the latest version installed and was just loaded on a new system.
creator: yomoose
